text: Franklyn Curran "Lyn" Nofziger (June 8, 1924 â€“ March 27, 2006) was an American journalist, conservative Republican political consultant and author. He was press secretary in Ronald Reagan's administration as Governor of California, and as a White House advisor during the Richard Nixon administration and again during the Reagan presidency. Nofziger also ran political campaigns for Pat Buchanan and Steve Forbes. Nofziger died on March 27, 2006 at his home in Falls Church, Virginia from kidney cancer, aged 81.Lyn Nofziger, 81; Key Aide Helped Groom Reagan for the White House ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2006 deaths Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:American political commentators Category:American political writers Category:American autobiographers Category:Journalists from California Category:Politicians from Bakersfield, California Category:Writers from Bakersfield, California Category:Cancer deaths in Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from kidney cancer
